feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-07-27T18:00:52.935512Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;BlazingMQ：高性能开源消息队列系统</stitle>; <id>;https://bloomberg.github.io/blazingmq/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-27T17:0 0:24.476973Z</updated>; <link href="https://bloomberg.github.io/blazingmq/"/>; <author>; <name>;carride</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=carride</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;BlazingMQ 是一个分布式消息队列平台，专注于现代工作流程的效率、可靠性和丰富的功能集。它为高扇出工作流程提供始终如一的低延迟，并显着节省网络带宽和延迟。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#blazingmq-high-performance-open-source-message-queuing-system" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36896034" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;波浪墙比直墙使用的砖块更少（2020）</stitle>; <id>;https://twistedsifter.com/2020/06/how-wavy-crinkle-crankle-walls-use-less-bricks-than-straight-walls/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-27T14:00:24.59037 3Z</updated>; <link href="https://twistedsifter.com/2020/06/how-wavy-crinkle-crankle-walls-use-less-bricks-than-straight-walls/"/>; <作者>; <name>;caiobegotti</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=caiobegotti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// twistedsifter.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/AITAGFHomeDecor.png?resize=188%2C128" style="宽度：220px；高度：150px；" />;<br />;波浪墙比直墙使用的砖块少，因为它们只需一块砖薄，而直墙很容易倒塌。这些壁也被称为皱纹曲柄壁、crinkum leverum 壁、蛇形壁或带状壁。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#wavy-walls-use-fewer-bricks-than-a-straight-wall-2020" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36892970" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;启动 HN：PeerDB (YC S23) – 适用于 Postgres 的快速、本机 ETL/ELT</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36895220</id>; <updated>;2023-07-27T16:00:24.592660Z</updated>; <link href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36895220"/>; <author>; <name>;saisrirampur</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=saisrirampur</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;PeerDB 是 Postgres 优先的数据移动平台，可简化 Postgres 中的数据移入和移出。它提供快速可靠的同步、实时更改数据捕获以及查询结果流式传输。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#launch-hn-peerdb-yc-s23-fast-native-etl-elt-for-postgres" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36895220" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;引导至 60 万欧元 MRR 并被 Shopify 杀死：Checkout X</stitle>; <id>;https://www.leteyski.com/bootstrapping-to-600k-mrr-and-getting-killed-by-shopify-the-story-of-checkout-x</id>; <updated>;2023-07-27T17:0 0:24.593563Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.leteyski.com/bootstrapping-to-600k-mrr-and-getting-killed-by-shopify-the-story-of-checkout-x"/>; <作者>; <name>;ericthegoodking</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ericthegoodking</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.feather.blog/?src=https%3A%2F%2Fusenotioncms.com%2Fproxy%2Fblock%2F8ee75a3c-34dd-430a-b57d-fc482130e6db%252Fe9cc11d8-3cf7-4723-af43-18d4ed6f57c4%252FUn titled.png&optimizer=image" style="width: 220px; height: 138px;" />;<br />;Checkout X 最初是作为 Shopify 结账流程中有限的自定义选项的解决方案。创始人在其他 Shopify 商店取得成功后，决定创建一个 Shopify 应用程序。该应用程序最初在结账前提供小额追加销售，后来扩展到包括单页结账和购买后追加销售。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#bootstrapping-to-eur600k-mrr- and-getting-killed-by-shopify-checkout-x" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36896343" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;纤维注入墨水启用3D打印心肌跳动</stitle>; <id>;https://seas.harvard.edu/news/2023/07/ Fiber-infused-ink-enables-3d-printed-heart-muscle-beat</id>; <updated>;2023-07-27T16:00:24.594395Z</updated>; <link href="https://seas.harvard.edu/news/2023/ 07/fibre-infused-ink-enables-3d-printed-heart-muscle-beat"/>; <作者>; <名称>;geox</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=geox</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://seas.harvard.edu/sites/default/files/styles/news_teaser_small_1x/public/2023-0 7/Fig%201_cryogel%20SEM.jpg?h=6fa74f03&itok=-fj7l5jL" style="宽度：220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;墨水帮助心肌细胞对齐，以便它们能够协调收缩<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/# Fiber-infused-ink-enables-3d-printed-heart-muscle-to-beat" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36894749" target="_b lank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Blade-Runner-Tailwind：《银翼杀手》主题 Tailwind 组件集合</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/martyjacobsdev/Blade-Runner-Tailwind</id>; <更新>;2023-07-27T17:00:24。 595210Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/martyjacobsdev/Blade-Runner-Tailwind"/>; <作者>; <name>;thunderbong</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thunderbong</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/martyjacobsdev/Blade-Runner-Tailwind/main/Re来源/预览/Accordion.png" style="width: 220px; height: 163px;" />;<br />;银翼杀手主题的 Tailwind 组件集合🏙️ - GitHub - martyjacobsdev/Blade-Runner-Tailwind：银翼杀手主题的 Tailwind 组件集合🏙️ <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#blade-runner-tailwind-a-collection-of-blade-runner-themed-tailwind-components" target="_blan k">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36895806" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;室温、环境压力超导 – 这次是真的吗？</stitle>; <id>;https://scanalyst.fourmi lab.ch/t/room-Temperature-ambient-Pressure-Superconductivity-this-time-for-real/3512</id>; <updated>;2023-07-27T16:00:24.596034Z</updated>; <link href="https://scanalyst.fourmilab.ch/t/room-Temperature-ambient-Pressure-superconductivity-this-time-for-real/3512"/>; <作者>; <名称>;突变体_glofish</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mutant_glofish</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://scanalyst.fourmilab.ch/uploads/default/optimized/2X/8/86a2c8ac52804c90ede238d99cb944037c6f82f6_2_1024 x597.png" style="宽度: 220px; height: 129px;" />;<br />;韩国量子能源研究中心和KU-KIST融合科学技术研究生院的研究人员开发出一种在室温及以上温度下表现出超导性的铅磷灰石材料。该材料的临界温度为400 K（127°C），可以在环境大气压下保持超导性。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#room-temporary-ambient-Pressure-super conductivity-this-time-for-real" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36894613" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：我构建了一个多人游戏 Gameboy</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/tjholm/multiboy</id>; <更新>;2023-07-27T14:00:24.597606Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/tjholm/multiboy"/>; <作者>; <name>;tholm</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tholm</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img s rc =“https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tjholm/multiboy/main/assets/architecture.png”样式=“宽度：220px; height: 96px;" />;<br />;此项目中使用的模拟器不是由我创作的，位于此处。已对其进行了一些小的调整以用于流音频。如果演示失败，我们深表歉意，如果您有兴趣尝试一下，请告诉我问题，或者您也可以在本地计算机上运行它或将其部署到您自己的 AWS 帐户。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-i-built-a-multiplayer-gameboy" target="_blan k">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36875962" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;SQLite 开始并发</stitle>; <id>;https://www.sqlite.org/cgi/src/doc/begin -concurrent/doc/begin_concurrent.md</id>; <更新>;2023-07-27T14:00:24.598428Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.sqlite.org/cgi/src/doc/begin-concurrent/doc/begin_concurrent.md"/>; <作者>; <name>;fauigerzigerk</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=fauigerzigerk</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.sqlite.org/cgi/src/logo" style="width: 220px; height: 102px;" />;<br />;如果数据库处于“wal”或“wal2”模式，SQLite 的 BEGIN CONCURRENT 增强功能允许多个写入器同时处理写入事务。系统使用乐观页级锁定来防止提交冲突的并发事务。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#sqlite-begin-concurrent" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news .ycombinator.com/item?id=36893193" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;ufw/iptables 未阻止 DHCP</stitle>; <id>;https://unix.stackexchange.com/questions/447440/ufw-iptables-not- blocking-dhcp-udp-port-67#447524</id>; <更新>;2023-07-27T15:00:24.599285Z</更新>; <link href="https://unix.stackexchange.com/questions/447440/ufw-iptables-not-blocking-dhcp-udp-port-67#447524"/>; <作者>; <name>;timost</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=timost</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.sstatic.net/Img/teams/teams-illo-free-sidebar-promo.svg?v=47faa659a05e" style="width: 220px; height: 181px;" />;<br />;即使 UDP 端口 67 未打开，DHCP 客户端也能够从服务器获取 DHCP 租约。这是因为，如果 DHCP 客户端没有从 UDP 端口 67 上的广播获得响应，则会回退到 UDP 端口 68 上的广播。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#dhcp-is-not-blocked-by-ufw-iptables" target="_blank">;[sum mary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36894198" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;设计思维运动是荒谬的（2018）</stitle>; <id>;https://sts-news.medium.com/ the-design-thinking-movement-is-absurd-83df815b92ea</id>; <更新>;2023-07-27T15:00:24.600086Z</updated>; <link href="https://sts-news.medium.com/the-design-thinking-movement-is-absurd-83df815b92ea"/>; <作者>; <名称>;Lutzb</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Lutzb</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit:1358/1*zPsaoizGmZ_XqZRKOjMf3Q.png" style="width: 220px; height: 120px;" />;<br />;设计思维是一种模糊且被过度炒作的运动，在设计界和商业界很受欢迎。它与 IDEO 和斯坦福大学的 d.school 相关，并被作为改革教育和其他社会机构的一种方式来推动。但它缺乏明确的定义，其有效性值得怀疑。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-design-thinking-movement-is-absurd-2018" target=" _blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36893635" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;食品（有机食品）中的放射性</stitle>; <id>;https://www.nrc.gov/about -nrc/radiation/around-us/doses-daily-lives.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-27T16:00:24.600891Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.nrc.gov/about-nrc/radiation/around-us/doses-daily-lives.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;jdcampolargo</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=jdcampolargo</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.nrc.gov/images/about-nrc/radiation/factoid2.gif" style="width: 220px; height: 126px;" />;<br />;平均而言，美国人每年接受约 0.62 雷姆（620 毫雷姆）的辐射剂量。该剂量的一半来自自然本底辐射。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#radioactivity-in-food-organic-food" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=368 95536" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;KernType – 字母间距游戏</stitle>; <id>;https://type.method.ac/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-27T10:00:24.601700Z</updated>; <link href="https://type.method.ac/"/>; <author>; <name>;antidnan</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=antidnan</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://type.method.ac/ogimage.png" style="width: 220px; height: 138px;" />;<br />;一个学习如何调整字距的游戏 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#kerntype-a-letter-spacing-game" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36887816" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry >; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;“第一修正案审计员”就警察局记录权起诉纽约警察局</stitle>; <id>;https://reason.com/2023/07/24/first-amendment-auditor-sues-nypd-over-right-to-record-in-police-stations/</id>; <更新>;2023-0 7-27T16:00:24.602515Z</updated>; <link href="https://reason.com/2023/07/24/first-amendment-auditor-sues-nypd-over-right-to-record-in-police-stations/"/>; <作者>; <name>;jaawns</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jaawns</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://d2eehagpk5cl65.cloudfront.net/img/q60/uploads/2023/07/image.jpg" style="width: 220px;身高：124px;" />;<br />;“第一修正案审计员”肖恩保罗·雷耶斯 (SeanPaul Reyes) 对纽约警察局提起联邦诉讼，因他多次在纽约市警察局内拍摄而被捕。诉讼称，纽约警察局禁止在警察局录音的禁令违反了第一修正案。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#first-amendment-auditor-sues-nypd-over-right-to -record-in-police-stations" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36895354" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;了解物联网设备的电池性能</stitle>; <id >;https://interrupt.memfault.com/blog/monitoring-battery-life</id>; <updated>;2023-07-27T15:00:24.603337Z</updated>; <link href="https://interrupt.memfault.com/blog/monitoring-battery-life"/>; <author>; <name>;tyhoff</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =tyhoff</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://interrupt.memfault.com/img/monitoring-battery-life/battery-Voltage-Temperature.webp" style="width: 220px; height: 118px;" />;<br />;由于客户需要无线和电池供电的设备，电池寿命对硬件公司来说是一个持续的挑战。本文讨论了如何收集指标、分析数据和预测物联网设备的电池寿命。它还强调了可靠的电池行为的重要性以及测量电池容量的挑战。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#understand-battery-performance-of-iot-devices" target="_blank">;[summary]</ a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36893965" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;LLaMA2 Chat 70B 优于 ChatGPT</stitle>; <id>;https://tatsu-lab.github.io/alpaca_e val/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-27T16:00:24.604124Z</updated>; <link href="https://tatsu-lab.github.io/alpaca_eval/"/>; <author>; <name>;georgehill</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=georgehill</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw .githubusercontent.com/tatsu-lab/alpaca_eval/main/docs/AlpacaFarm_small.png" style="width: 220px; height: 222px;" />;<br />;AlpacaEval 是一种快速、廉价、可靠的基于 LLM 的自动评估工具。它将模型响应与参考响应进行比较，与人工注释的一致性较高。欢迎社区贡献。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#llama2-chat-70b-outperformed-chatgpt" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36895300" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;QEMU 中的 MacOS – ARM 版本 [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https://kvm-forum.qemu.org/media/2023/submissions/ GDRJLK/resources/macOS_in_QEMU_on_ARM_FhJY65D.pdf</id>; <更新>;2023-07-27T05:00:24.604905Z</更新>; <link href="https://kvm-forum.qemu.org/media/2023/submissions/GDRJLK/resources/macOS_in_QEMU_on_ARM_FhJ Y65D.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;watusername</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=watusername</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;专用芯片标识是用作根卷加密密钥的唯一芯片 ID。它与 iPhone/iPad 中的设备相同，用于对数据（包括根卷）进行哈希处理，并包含嵌入式密钥。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#macos-in-qemu-arm-edition-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36889092" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;Brave 是一个分叉，而不是 Chromium reskin</stitle>; <id>;https://twitter.com/BrendanEich/status/1684561924191842304</id>; <updated>;2023-07-27T15:00:24.605680Z</updated>; <link href="https://twitter.com/BrendanEich/status/168 4561924191842304"/>; <author>; <name>;jacooper</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jacooper</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;出了点问题，但别担心 - 让我们再试一次。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#brave-is-a-fork-not-a-chromium-reskin" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36893654" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Depthboot – 您的 Chromebook，您做主</stitle>; <id>;https://eupnea-linux.github.io/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-27T04:00:24.606454Z</updated>; <link href="https://eupnea-linux.github.io/"/>; <author>; <name>;lwhsiao</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycom binator.com/user?id=lwhsiao</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://eupnea-linux.github.io/assets/depthboot-icon.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;启动完整的 Linux 系统并获得对设备的完全控制，而无需修改固件。在各种常见的 Linux 发行版和桌面环境之间进行选择，为受支持的 64 位 Chromebook 创建可启动映像。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#depthboot-your-chromebook-your-way" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36888598" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题type="text">;如何使用 Transformer 的替代方案更好地扩展 LLM</stitle>; <id>;https://hazyresearch.stanford.edu/blog/2023-07-25-m2-bert</id>; <updated>;2023-07-27T08:00:24.607264Z</updated>; <link href="https://hazyresearch.stanford.edu/blog/2023-07-25-m2- bert"/>; <author>; <name>;tuxguy</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tuxguy</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://hazyresearch.stanford.edu/static/posts/2023-07-25-m2-bert/m2-bert-logo.png" style="width: 220px; height: 137px;" />;<br />;Transformers 一直是现代基础模型背后的主力架构，并且在不同的应用中取得了令人印象深刻的经验成功。然而，我们需要一种 Transformer 的替代方案，能够更有效地扩展，同时在质量上保持匹配。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-to-scale-llms-better-with-an-alternative-to-transformers" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36890036" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hacker news.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;汽车制造商试图破坏马萨诸塞州的“维修权”法</stitle>; <id>;https://www.techdirt.com/2023/07/27/__trashed-4/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-27T13:00:24.608117Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.techdirt.com/202 3/07/27/__trashed-4/"/>; <author>; <name>;rntn</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rntn</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.techdirt.com/wp-content/themes/techdirt/assets/images/footer-logo.png" style="width: 220px; height: 181px; ” />;<br />;大型汽车制造商正试图破坏马萨诸塞州的一项法律，该法律旨在使汽车维修更容易获得和负担得起。他们使用误导性策略并散布虚假声明来吓唬公众和立法者。尽管获得了压倒性的公众支持，但该法律仍被汽车制造商和国家公路交通安全管理局搁置。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#automakers-try-to-scuttle-massachusetts-right-to-repair-law" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36892506" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hack ernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;特斯拉成立了秘密团队来压制数千起练习场投诉</stitle>; <id>;https://www.reuters.com/investigates/special-report/tesla-batteries-range/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-27T11:00:24.609907Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.reuters.com/investigates/ Special-report/tesla-batteries-range/"/>; <author>; <name>;mfiguiere</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mfiguiere</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.reuters.com/investigates/special-report/assets/tesla-batteries-range/tesla-batteries-range_18.jpg?v=42 4710270723" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;大约十年前，特斯拉在其电动汽车中操纵了仪表盘读数，以提供车主在需要充电之前可以行驶多远的“乐观”预测。该汽车制造商成立了一个特别团队，负责因练习场投诉而取消车主的服务预约。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#tesla-created-secret-team-to-suppress-thousands-of-driven-range-complaints" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36891642" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Tarsnap 停机事后分析</stitle>; <id>;https://mail.tarsnap.com/tarsnap-announce/msg00050.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-27T05:00:24.610848Z</updated>; <link href="https://mail.tarsnap.com/ tarsnap-announce/msg00050.html"/>; <author>; <name>;anderiv</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=anderiv</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;当中央服务器由于硬件故障而脱机时，Tarsnap 服务发生中断。服务器已重新启动，但显示文件系统损坏，导致决定设置新服务器。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#tarsnap-outage-postmortem" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36888954" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题type="text">;施乐 PARC 特别</stitle>; <id>;https://thechipletter.substack.com/p/chip-letter-links-no-21-xerox-parc</id>; <更新>;2023-07-27T09:00:24.611661Z</updated>; <link href="https://thechipletter.substack.com/p/chip-letter-links-no-21-xerox- parc"/>; <author>; <name>;giuliomagnifico</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=giuliomagnifico</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post -media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Fbadf498f-65ed-4422-a4db-949b42295097_1468x892.jpeg" style="宽度：220px；高度：134px；" />;<br />;Xerox PARC（帕洛阿尔托研究中心）是 Xerox 的研发中心，成立于 1969 年。它开发了多种技术，包括 Xerox Alto、PUP 和以太网。然而，施乐未能将这些技术中的大部分转化为成功的商业产品。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#xerox-parc-special" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36873322" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text ">;数据差异：解释数据集中发生变化的算法 (2022)</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.marcua.net/2022/02/20/data-diffs-algorithms-for-explaining-what-c​​hanged-in-a-dataset.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-27T04:00:24.613334Z</updated>; <link href="https ://blog.marcua.net/2022/02/20/data-diffs-algorithms-for-explaining-what-c​​hanged-in-a-dataset.html"/>; <作者>; <name>;winkywooster</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=winkywooster</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blog.marcua.net/assets/images /diff/scorpion-figure1.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：103px；" />;<br />;解释算法用于回答“为什么？”数据分析中的问题。他们通过查看列/属性来识别数据集中的高似然解释。 Scorpion 和 DIFF 是解释算法的两种方法，Scorpion 对聚合进行操作，而 DIFF 是用 SQL 表示的数据库运算符。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#data-diffs-algorithms-for-explaining-what-c​​hanged-in-a-dataset-2022" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36888667" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;如何使用 Chrome 的本地覆盖测试网站速度变化 (2021)</stitle>; <id>;https://tryblackbird.com/blog/local-overrides</id>; <updated>;2023-07-27T11:00:24.614191Z</updated>; <link href="https://tryblackbird.com/blog/local-override s"/>; <author>; <name>;illdave</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=illdave</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://tryblackbird.com/images/overrides.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 164px;" />;<br />;提高网站速度可能很复杂。 Chrome DevTools 有一个名为 Local Overrides 的功能，可以极大地改善测试网站速度变化的反馈循环。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-i-test-site-speed-changes-using-chrome-s-local-overrides-2021" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36891735" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;超导新闻：声称的内容以及证据似乎有多有力</stitle>; <id>;https://www.science.org/content/blog-post/break-superconductor-news</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T19:00:24.615038Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.science.org/content/blog- post/break-superconductor-news"/>; <author>; <name>;etiam</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=etiam</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#superconductor-news-whats-claimed-and-how-strong-the-evidence-seems-to-be" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36881808" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
